entry.title: Nagercoil Banana Chips-நாகர்கோவில் நேந்திரம் சிப்ஸ்
entry.summary:
Vendor: Ramalekshmi Sweets
Type: Veg
Price: 260.00

This product is not eligible for one-day delivery

 

Banana Chips - A Royal Treat Beyond Ordinary

Look beyond the ordinary and savor the royal taste of Nendhiram (banana) chips. Made from carefully selected Raw Nendhiram bananas . these chips boast an unparalleled aroma. Authentic groundnut oil is used for frying, and black pepper is added for tempering, ensuring a flavor that lingers in your mouth. These chips stay fresh for up to 30 days from the date of preparation

INGREDIENTS 

Raw Plantain, Salt, Turmeric Powder, Pepper, Groundnut Oil. 

SERVING GUIDE:

Store in an airtight container.

SHELF LIFE:

Enjoy the royal flavor for 30 days.

Savor the regal essence in every bite - order now at Pettikadai!
